stepTitle:
Four containers hold equal amounts (2 moles) of different gases and are heated under constant volume. Estimate the heat transferred, q, for each gas, considering its molecular structure (monatomic or diatomic). Rank the gases based on the amount of heat transferred from smallest to largest.

Containers:
a. Container 1: $$2$$ mol He
$$b$$. Container 2: $$2$$ mol H₂
c. Container 3: $$2$$ mol Ne
$$d$$. Container 4: $$2$$ mol N₂
stepBody: Please format the answer as follows: a < $$b$$ < c < $$d$$.
